text: Wild Camp (French title: Camping sauvage) is a 2005 French drama movie. It was released on DVD on February 13, 2007. It is about Camille, a 17 year old girl who lives in a holiday camp with her family and her boyfriend Fred. This movie was nominated for a Golden Zenith at the Montr√©al World Film Festival. == Other websites == * * * Category:French movies Category:2005 movies Category:2000s drama movies
